mapper.select: select o.total, o.order_date, d.order_id, d.order_details_id, d.delivery_status, d.order_amount,d.trackingNum, p.product_name, p.picture_url from product p, tbl_order o, order_details d where d.order_id=o.order_id and d.product_id=p.product_id order by order_id
mapper.update: update order_details set delivery_status='complete' where order_id=#{param1}
